featured.text: Often considered as representing the circle of life, hoops featured prominently in the ritual dances of Native Americans.
The circle-within-a-circle structure of an onion, for them, 34 the eternity of existence.

The fashion soon spread beyond the circle of the nobility to the middle classes, and tea became a popular drink at the London coffee houses where people met to do business and discuss events of the day.

definition.zh_def: 圓形的平面圖形，所有點到中心的距離相等。
definition.en_def: A round plane figure whose boundary consists of points equidistant from a fixed center.
definition.example: The children drew a large circle on the ground with chalk.
